titles.title: Electing Representative Greg Laughlin of Texas to the Committee on Ways and Means.

action.text: Considered as privileged matter.
Mr. Doggett demanded the question of consideration.
On motion to consider Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 176 (Roll no. 470).
Mr. DeLay moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Boehner moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
Motion to reconsider the vote tabled.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 179 (Roll no. 471).
Mr. Watt (NC) moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 229 (Roll no. 472).
Mr. DeLay moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Boehner moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 180 (Roll no. 473).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Boehner made a point of order that the remarks of Mr. Bonior during general debate on the resolution were not related to the subject of the resolution. The point of order was sustained.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Boehner made a point of order that the remarks of Mr. Bonior during general debate on the resolution were not related to the subject of the resolution. The point of order was sustained.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Bonior made a point of order that the remarks of Mr. Haywood during general debate on the resolution were not related to the subject of the resolution. The point of order was sustained.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Frank (MA) made a point of order that the remarks of Mr. Paxton during general debate on the resolution were not related to the subject of the resolution. The point of order was sustained.

POINT OF ORDER - Mr. Frank (MA) made a point of order that the remarks of Mr. Paxton during general debate on the resolution were not related to the subject of the resolution. The point of order was sustained.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 179 (Roll no. 474).
Mr. Frank (MA) moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Boehner moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
Motion to reconsider the vote tabled.
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 181 (Roll No. 475).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 248 - 162 (Roll no. 476).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/10/1995--Introduced. Elects Representative Greg Laughlin to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
